FOUND IN: Celibacy - The state of being unmarried, typically for religious reasons, often practiced by clergy members.
Avenue - A wide street in a city, often lined with trees and featuring pedestrian walkways.
Ebb - to gradually diminish or recede
Rush - to move or act with haste or urgency.
Glossary (a list or collection of terms and their definitions related to language, which may include words describing aspects of the tongue)
